title: Witch Hunt
description: Leigh has been married to a Hawthorne for a decade, but never knew the family the Hawthornes are witches. When the dynamic Preacher Cody instigates a new, world-wide witch hunt, Leigh must choose sides. Will she stand with her husband and children, or will she run? This isn't the first witch hunt the Hawthornes have faced, but it could be their last. Will anyone survive? A classic novel, updated for the 21st Century!NewWitchHunt.com
author: Devin O'Branagan
